180.author: undefined
180.message: Click on scrollbar does not grab list

376.author: undefined
376.message: Set the inset as: this.setPadding(Rectangle.inset(4,2)).  This gives it a more pleasing appearance with a border, and also makes it easier to select near the bounds.

392.comment: A simple box morph. A really blue one. Its amazing what you can build out of simple boxes.... Who needs stars when you got blue rectangles!
